skills.label: Prepare for installation requirements
items: Choose between an upgrade and a clean installation
Determine appropriate editions according to device type
Determine requirements for particular features such as hyper-v, cortana, miracast, virtual smart cards, and secure boot
Determine and create appropriate installation media

skills.label: Install Windows
items: Migrate from previous versions of windows
Configure windows for additional regional and language support

skills.label: Configure devices and device drivers
items: Install, update, disable, and roll back drivers
Configure driver settings including signed and unsigned drivers
Use the deployment image servicing and management (dism) tool to add packages

skills.label: Perform post-installation configuration
items: Configure and customize start menu, desktop, taskbar, and notification settings according to device type

skills.label: Implement Windows in an enterprise environment
items: Provision with the windows configuration designer tool
Implement volume activation using a key management service (kms)
Query and configure activation states using the command line
Configure active directory including group policies
Configure and optimize user account control (uac)

skills.label: Configure networking
items: Configure and support ipv4 and ipv6 network settings
Configure windows firewall with advanced security
Configure vpn such as app-triggered vpn, traffic filters, and lockdown vpn

skills.label: Configure storage
items: Configure disks, volumes and file system options using disk management, and windows powershell
Troubleshoot storage and removable devices issue

skills.label: Configure data access and usage
items: Configure file and printer sharing and homegroup connections
Configure folder shares, public folders, and onedrive
Configure onedrive usage including files on demand

skills.label: Implement Apps
items: Use the windows assessment and deployment kit (adk)

skills.label: Configure remote management
items: Choose the appropriate remote management tools
Modify settings remotely by using the microsoft management console (mmc) or windows powershell
Configure remote assistance including easy connect

skills.label: Configure updates
items: Implement insider preview, current branch (cb), current branch for business (cbb), and long term servicing branch (ltsb) scenarios

skills.label: Monitor Windows
items: Configure and analyze event viewer logs
Monitor performance using performance monitor and data collector sets
Manage client security by using windows defender
Evaluate system stability using reliability monitor
Manage security using the windows defender security center
Configure windows defender advanced threat detection

skills.label: Configure system and data recovery
items: Restore previous versions of files and folders
Perform a backup and restore with wbadmin
Perform recovery operations using windows recovery

skills.label: Configure advanced management tools
items: Configure automation of management tasks using windows powershell
Convert group policy objects to mdm policies using the mdm migration analysis tool
